subject: refactor: split monolithic dashboard into ES modules
body:
Extract the 6,927-line dashboard/index.html into focused modules:
- CSS → styles.css (1,200 lines)
- JS → 9 ES modules in js/ (state, utils, filters, ui, charts, tabs, data, export, main)
- HTML → slimmed index.html (889 lines, structure only)

Vite bundles all modules for production. No functionality changes.

https://claude.ai/code/session_01Vgswf2QVj1u7eBxdN3jsAg
title: split monolithic dashboard into ES modules
